abilities.name: Poison Sacs
abilities.effect: Your opponent can't remove the Special Condition Poisoned by evolving or devolving his or her Poisoned Pokémon. (This also includes putting a Pokémon Level-Up card onto the Poisoned Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Knuckle Claws
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
